Body: I am building a POC that uses an unlocked cellphone with only SMS capability to send GPS info to a central server. I'd like to use Azure's IoT hub, but I have searched and have not found any info on if you can send SMS INTO IoT hub or how.

Use a Logic App triggered by a Twilio SMS number. You then grab the SMS content and send it to IoT Hub. I believe there's a connector for that as well.

    Send SMS	        |	    Twilio triggered Logic App      \	        |                            |	    Get SMS body                     |  Logic App	        |                            |	    Place message into IoT Hub      /

If there's no IoT Hub connector then call an Azure Function and use that to send to IoT Hub.

"
OK, I'll try this and report back.
